xAxis.label: Leaked (L)
xAxis.calcFunction:
var leaked = sum(WM Region.full_consumption) - sum(WM Consumer.consumption);
return leaked;
xAxis.parsedFunction:
var leaked = row['full_consumptionSUM'] - row['consumptionSUM'];
return leaked;

xAxis.label: Leaked (%)
Losses (USD)

WM) Use case (D): States instead of pie

yAxis.stateCondition:
var consumption = none(WM Consumer.consumption);

return consumption <= 100;

var consumption = none(WM Consumer.consumption);
return 100 < consumption && consumption <= 300;

var consumption = none(WM Consumer.consumption);
return 300 < consumption;

WM) Use case: Consumer line chart

yAxis.label: Leaked (L)
yAxis.calcFunction:
var leaked = sum(WM Region.full_consumption) - sum(WM Consumer.consumption);
return Math.abs(leaked);
